nodes.text: "The Recruit, Part 2" (German title "Der Rekrut, Teil 2") is a comic strip written by Alec Worley, drawn by Ingo Römling, colored by Cosmo White and edited by Gunther Nickel. The story was published in the 2nd issue of the German Star Wars Resistance Animation-Magazine, which was released on July 17, 2019.
The comic partially adapts the first episode of the television series Star Wars Resistance.
